attributes.action: Clearly display CV19 vax status on all blood and organ donations.
attributes.additional_details: As has been reported recently in the press, certain CV19 vaxes are causing blood clots and heart issues (pericarditis and myocarditis) among other issues, which shows the CV19 vax is affecting the blood and organs in some way. Vaccination status needs to be clearly displayed (vax name and date of last vax/booster on donations to ensure that, if future issues are arise in the donor recipient due to the 'vaxed donations', these can then be traced for future monitoring, if the need arises.
attributes.background: Clearly display peoples CV19 vax status on all blood and organ donations. All donations should show vaccination name and date of last vaccination or booster jab to ensure the safety of the recipient of the donation.

rejection.details: Decisions on safety and blood donation are made based on the advice of the Advisory Committee on the Safety of Blood, Tissues and Organs.
